text: Laura Bueno Ferńandez (born 25 May 1993) is a Spanish sprinter specialising in the 400 metres. She represented her country at the 2018 World Indoor Championships. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=3|2016 |Ibero-American Championships |Rio de Janeiro, Brazil |bgcolor=silver|2nd |4 × 400 m relay |3:36.16 |- |rowspan=2|European Championships |rowspan=2|Amsterdam, Netherlands |14th (h) |400 m |54.01 |- |14th (h) |4 × 400 m relay |3:33.57 |- |2017 |European Indoor Championships |Belgrade, Serbia |21st (h) |400 m |54.21 |- |rowspan=6|2018 |World Indoor Championships |Birmingham, United Kingdom |25th (h) |400 m |53.66 |- |Mediterranean Games |Tarragona, Spain |9th (h) |400 m |53.15 |- |rowspan=2|European Championships |rowspan=2|Berlin, Germany |22nd (sf) |400 m |52.46 |- |11th (h) |4 × 400 m relay |3:33.18 |- |rowspan=2|Ibero-American Championships |rowspan=2|Trujillo, Peru |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |400 m |52.88 |- |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |4 × 400 m relay |3:38.32 |- |2019 |European Indoor Championships |Glasgow, United Kingdom |8th (sf) |400 m |53.05 |} ==Personal bests== Outdoor *100 metres – 12.43 (Málaga 2020) *400 metres – 52.14 (Berlín 2018) Indoor *200 metres – 24.47 (Antequera 2019) *400 metres – 52.67 (Glasgow 2018) *800 metres – 2:06.26 (Sabadell-2019) ==National récords== Outdoor *500 metres – 1:11.33 (Antequera 2019) *600 metres – 1:28.14 (Antequera 2019) Indoor *500 metres – 1:11.13 (Granada 2017) *600 metres – 1:26.21 (Barcelona 2018) ==Social Networks== *Instagram: @labfdez *Visit her website: www.laurabueno.webnode.es ==Official sponsor== Nike (January 1, 2018 - at present) ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish female sprinters Category:Sportspeople from Granada Category:Mediterranean Games bronze medalists for Spain Category:Mediterranean Games medalists in athletics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2018 Mediterranean Games
title: Laura Bueno
